name: Godbert the Champion: Space Hunt
description:
[WIP]

A Sci-Fi action game inspired by Starfox, in which you hunt and shoot aliens from all over space! Survive for as long as you can, and sit back and relax as you cause carnage and chaos in the cosmos!

Anderson [2019758] - Co-Leader
